questions.question: This process involves creating a three-dimensional object by adding material layer by layer.
This type of 3D printing uses a laser to cure liquid resin into solid layers.
This material is commonly used in 3D printing and is known for its strength and durability.
This type of 3D printing involves melting and extruding plastic filament to create objects.
This term refers to the digital file that contains the instructions for a 3D printer to create an object.
